Package de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.constraint.analysis

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PBSolver
    The PBSolver interface encapsulates the functionality of a pseudo boolean satisfiability solver.
    RestrictionFactory<T>
    The different feature model analysis operations need different concrete implementations to reason on the input date.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeRestriction
    Implementation of the Restriction class.
    DeRestrictionFactory
    Constructs a new DeRestriction and adds it to a list of restriction.
    ExtendedFeatureModelAnalyzer
    Checks the ExtendedFeatureModel for validation.
    Restriction
    The abstract Restriction class provides a template to build specialized subclasses which represent a pseudo-boolean restriction (equation or inequality).
    SAT4JPBSolver
    Implementation of PBSolver using the sat4j library.
    Term
    Term represents a mathematical term in a (linear) pseudo-boolean restriction.
    Translator
    The Translator utility provides a bunch of handy tools to translate feature models and their associated rules in the internal model to apply analysis.
    UniqueId
    Provides a simple and thread-safe way to generate successive natural numbers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Restriction.Op
